brics_3d::EuclideanClusteringPCL Class Reference
Segmentation

The class provides a wrapper for ONLY simple KDTree based Euclidean Cluster Extraction in PCL Note that the decoration information (if any) will be lost while converting to the native data-types. More...

Detailed Description

The class provides a wrapper for ONLY simple KDTree based Euclidean Cluster Extraction in PCL Note that the decoration information (if any) will be lost while converting to the native data-types.
